Wullie Hunter






to raise awareness for chronic cluster headache suffers,
i.e publicly,among gp's,employers and the benifits system and most of all research.
the lifes cluster headaches suffers and people around them gets destroyed as attacks are very debilitating.
if you google cluster headaches you will find it is the most painful condition known to human beings and still there is no real known remedy.
i urge the government to take responsibility for all the above tasks and help all suffers find the help needed.
